description: This file defines the main application shell component for a React-based TV streaming app. It manages layout, navigation, and focus behavior, including handling of remote control keys and route-based titles.

methods.name: AppShell()
methods.description: Main functional component that renders the app's shell including navigation, header, and outlet for route content.

methods.name: handleEnterNav
methods.description: Handles navigation when a navigation item is clicked or focused and Enter is pressed.
